column2: appearance=Thick ridged bark with long needle leaves and seed-cones

column1: '''Cedars''' were huge resinous trees with spreading branches. In the [[Third Age]], as today, cedars were most common in warmer lands, but they were apparently not unknown in [[the Shire]].  While in [[Ithilien]], [[Frodo Baggins
column3: Sam]] decided to rest near a bank crowned with old cedars.<ref>{{TT
